text: (And when Our messengers) Gabriel and the angels who were with him (came unto Lot, he was troubled upon their account) he disliked their coming, (for he could not protect them) from the abominable act of his people; (but they) Gabriel and the angels (said: Fear not) for us, (nor grieve) about us, for fear of our peril! (Lo! we are to deliver you) from your people (and your household) and your two daughters, ((all) save your wife) the hypocrite, (who is of those who stay behind) and be destroyed.
